attributes.action: I am English so please allow me the right to be English
attributes.additional_details:
from our passports to just about every other official form we fill in we are asked for our nationality and we do not get the option to say we are English we have to say we are British.
I would like to be English please and would like my passport to state that.Most of us are extremely proud to be English just as the Scottish are to be Scottish and the welsh to be welsh.
so although as a collective it is Great Britain I am English first
I would like the government to allow us to have an English passport and to have an English option under nationality on forms
